query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST211 A USING (SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) AS MANDT, CAST(#SEQ# AS VARCHAR(3)) AS SEQ FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 )B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.SEQ = B.SEQ AND A.PSNO = #PSNO# WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET GBN1 = #GBN1# , GBN2 = #GBN2# , C_NO = #C_NO# , C_DATE = #C_DATE# , E_DATE = #E_DATE# , Q_NM = #Q_NM# , Q_NO = #Q_NO# , RMK = #RMK# , EDATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE), ETIME = HEX(CURRENT TIME), --수정 EUSER = #G_USER_ID#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( MANDT, PSNO, SEQ, GBN1, GBN2, C_NO, C_DATE, E_DATE, Q_NM, Q_NO, RMK, MDATE, MTIME, MUSER, EDATE, ETIME, EUSER ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #PSNO#, (SELECT SAPHEE.FILLINZERO(INT(COALESCE(MAX(SEQ),'0')) + 1, 3) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST211 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PSNO = #PSNO#), #GBN1#, #GBN2#, #C_NO#, #C_DATE#, #E_DATE#, #Q_NM#, #Q_NO#, #RMK#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), --수정 #G_USER_ID#, '', '', '' )
